title:
1447“Can you stop at the camera, please?"

RUBIO: “I didn’t talk to you guys when I worked here, why
content:
1447 “Can you stop at the camera, please?"

RUBIO: “I didn’t talk to you guys when I worked here, why would I talk to you NOW?" posted 6 days ago by DeusVult1096 101 comments award share report block Eric Daugherty @EricLDaugh • 6d 🚨 LMAO! Marco Rubio is the BEST Secretary of State! “Can you stop at the camera, please?" RUBIO: “I didn’t talk to you guys when I worked here, why would I talk to you NOW?" We love Marco 🤣🔥
101 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Bullet3250 138 points 6 days ago If a republican talks to the MEDIA - they will just lie about what he says. Republicans should have stopped engaging with the MSM 30 years ago. permalink award report block reply ChrisSuperDude 96 points 6 days ago My favorite thing to say to liberals when they wanna debate the last month has been “you people shot the last guy who actually wanted to debate you, why should I take that risk?” permalink parent award report block reply Bullet3250 43 points 6 days ago And of course - if they used 'reason and logic' and looked at policy fairly - they would be MAGA already. There is no debating those people - and I have tried. permalink parent award report block reply TheThreeSeashells 7 points 6 days ago I listen to Andrew Wilkow's show every day while I work.  Every single Leftist that calls him starts off thinking they "got him" with one of their moronic points.  Andrew immediately blows them out of the water with facts and logic and they immediately go right to angrily yelling, name calling, and insults.  Every single time. permalink parent award report block reply cucks_on_parade 4 points 6 days ago Right down to my ex high school friends.  They're all under the same brainwashed spell producing nearly identical results in every individual regardless of purported "beliefs."  One of the modern marvels in a way permalink parent award report block reply MehNahMehNah 2 points 5 days ago Wilkow is a sharp dude. permalink parent award report block reply Quietam_Unum 1 points 5 days ago I really enjoyed Andrew back when I had Sirius/XM but it isn't worth getting JUST for the Wilkow Show any more. The best thing I ever heard on Sirius/XM was on the David Webb show.  He took a call on air from some lefty journalist/blogger type and the laughs started.  She went off on him for several minutes on end berating him for his "white privilege."  He let her go on, no interruptions,  until she finally ran down. Then, and only then, he pointed out that "her people" needed to do better vetting so she'd know when the was interviewing black people. permalink parent award report block reply realPhantomFuck 6 points 6 days ago Debate died with Charlie. permalink parent award report block reply Citizen_Bob 17 points 6 days ago the media is a political party operating as PR firms operating as ad salesmen operating as news edit: can pro'ly put deep state before the party permalink parent award report block reply SicSemperTyrannis2 1 points 6 days ago Al Jazeera is the same thing, just working for Qatar. permalink parent award report block reply Ralph-RaccooN 2 points 6 days ago people that are under attack of the media can detect the lies, if your part of the mob its harder. its no wonder RT and Al Jazeera popped up. permalink parent award report block reply BeekeepingPatriot 80 points 6 days ago He’s been my favorite surprise in this entire administration. He was a RINO, but when he saw how popular Trump was with people after Trump won the first term he started to copy Trump to a degree. Did it long enough that the RINO part of him slowly starved while that new attitude and observation was fed. Eventually, this became his real attitude before he was even nominated to the position, and working in that position just enforced that new attitude. I still say never trust politicians, but look at their work record.
